content: this text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case involving a datarelated issue the appellant filed an appeal challenging a decision made by a lower court in favor of the respondent the higher court reviewed the arguments and evidence presented by both parties and made a decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the text also mentions various details of the case such as the division of assets debts owed to a bank and the value of properties and a motorcycle it discusses the legal arguments made by the parties and the errors identified in the lower courts decision the court of appeal has made changes to the judgment and referred the case back to the court of first instance for a new trial the text also mentions the costs of the proceedings and the specific paragraphs of the judgment that were altered or dismissed overall the text provides an overview of the legal process and the key points of the case without revealing the names of the parties involved

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba in sklep Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani II Cp 39/2022, 31. 1. 2022
